name: bj-ablsscmn

body.origin:
|- wss(cabl, ccmn)
-| wceq(cabl, cin(cgrp, ccmn))
-| wss(cin(cgrp, ccmn), ccmn)
body.pretty:
⊢ Abel ⊆ CMnd
⊣ Abel =(Grp ⋂ CMnd)
⊣ (Grp ⋂ CMnd)⊆ CMnd

cumulated.origin:
|- wss(cabl, ccmn)
-| wceq(cabl, cin(cgrp, ccmn))
-| wss(cin(cgrp, ccmn), ccmn)
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ Abel ⊆ CMnd
⊣ Abel =(Grp ⋂ CMnd)
⊣ (Grp ⋂ CMnd)⊆ CMnd

comment: Abelian groups are commutative monoids. (Contributed by BJ, 9-Jun-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
